page.title: 05Employment-Youth.
page.content: Youth unemployment in the area is very high.Organisations like Community Industry offer work experience for 16-20 year olds,often for a year.Tasks are carried out for the local authority and voluntary or charity organisations. Central Government pays the wages($303 000 in N.Tyneside for 1984/5)and N.Tyne -side pay the running costs($33,387). C.I.is for the disadvantaged-and aims to develop craft skills and a caring attitude towards young employees.
